abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
abilities.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The drow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: dancing lights, detect magic
* 1/day each: clairvoyance, darkness, detect thoughts, dispel magic, faerie fire , levitate (self only), suggestion

abilities.name: Lolth's Fickle Favor.
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the matron can bestow the Spider Queen's blessing on one ally she can see within 30 feet of her. The ally takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage but has advantage on the next attack roll it makes until the end of its next turn.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The drow is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom. The drow has the following cleric spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, resistance, sacred flame , thaumaturgy
* 1st level (4 slots): bane, command, cure wounds, guiding bolt
* 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, silence, spiritual weapon
* 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, clairvoyance, dispel magic, spirit guardians
* 4th level (3 slots): banishment, death ward, freedom of movement, guardian of faith
* 5th level (3 slots): contagion, flame strike , geas, mass cure wounds
* 6th level (2 slots): blade barrier, harm
* 7th level (2 slots): divine word, plane shift
* 8th level (1 slot): holy aura
* 9th level (1 slot): gate

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
